title: Proposal #005 - NFT Acquisitions
body:
To improve the speed at which we acquire NFTs for $DTF, while preserving as much community input as possible.

We've recently been missing out on potential NFT launches/opportunities that are announced within 6-12 hours (eg. Wavelengths, RTFKTs, BAYC). Without a system, we'll continue to lose opportunities.
If there is an NFT that you'd like the DAO to acquire:

1. Create a proposal in Notion & post in #nft-foundry is Discord
    1. Example templates:
        1. [Pak](https://www.notion.so/Pak-Proposal-a-shitty-example-6e3d0ab2f5a44a669b56dee7d5c3f1ca)
        2. [ZIGGURATS](https://www.notion.so/ZIGGURATS-by-Linkin-Park-Mike-Shinoda-a515813e333b4be69a9a4cb5c58db06e)
2. Tag + request 1 of 6 DAO admins to create a snapshot with vote options:
    1. Strongly Agree
    2. Agree
    3. Disagree
    4. Strongly Disagree
3. Set a deadline for vote
4. Have DAO admin post in #announcements channel, tag everyone to vote
5. At deadline, 3 key holders must be ready to pull the trigger.

What is the minimum # of votes required to approve a transaction?
author: 0xF146f3bf137683c6d2fE266F6a2DC352A615Eb0C
